AddTagsToCertificate.name: AddTagsToCertificate
AddTagsToCertificate.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a certificate

DeleteCertificate.name: DeleteCertificate
DeleteCertificate.description: Grants permission to delete a certificate and its associated private key

DescribeCertificate.name: DescribeCertificate
DescribeCertificate.description: Grants permission to retreive a certificates and its metadata

ExportCertificate.name: ExportCertificate
ExportCertificate.description:
Grants permission to Export a private certificate issued by a private certificate
                                                authority (CA) for use anywhere

GetAccountConfiguration.name: GetAccountConfiguration
GetAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve account level configuration from AWS Certificate Manager

GetCertificate.name: GetCertificate
GetCertificate.description:
Grants permission to to etrieves a certificate and certificate chain for a certificate
                                                ARN

ImportCertificate.name: ImportCertificate
ImportCertificate.description:
Grants permission to imports a 3rd party certificate into AWS Certificate Manager
                                                (ACM)

ListCertificates.name: ListCertificates
ListCertificates.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a list of the certificate ARNs and the domain name for
                                                each ARN

ListTagsForCertificate.name: ListTagsForCertificate
ListTagsForCertificate.description: Grants permission to lists the tags that have been associated with a certificate

PutAccountConfiguration.name: PutAccountConfiguration
PutAccountConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update account level configuration in AWS Certificate Manager

RemoveTagsFromCertificate.name: RemoveTagsFromCertificate
RemoveTagsFromCertificate.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a certificate

RenewCertificate.name: RenewCertificate
RenewCertificate.description: Grants permission to renew an eligible private certificate

RequestCertificate.name: RequestCertificate
RequestCertificate.description: Grants permission to requests a public or private certificate

ResendValidationEmail.name: ResendValidationEmail
ResendValidationEmail.description: Grants permission to resend an email to request domain ownership validation

UpdateCertificateOptions.name: UpdateCertificateOptions
UpdateCertificateOptions.description:
Grants permission to update a certificate configuration. Use this specify whether
                                                to opt in to or out of certificate transparency logging
